{{ errorMessage }}
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; import { AuthService } from '../Services/auth.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-login', templateUrl: './login.component.html', styleUrls: ['./login.component.css'] }) export class LoginComponent { username: string = ''; password: string = ''; errorMessage: string = ''; constructor(private authService: AuthService, private router: Router) {} login() { this.authService.login(this.username, this.password).subscribe( response => { console.log('Login successful', response); this.router.navigate(['/dashboard']); }, error => { console.error('Login failed', error); this.errorMessage = 'Login failed. Please check your username and password.'; } ); } }
